Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Lavergne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Cicero and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Laramie, Washington, Cicero and Madison: due to, street blockage near Madison/Lavergne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
